Method.name: OnPageBODY
Method.Implementation: Write "<body>" Write !,!," " Write "<!-- Put your page code here -->" Write !," My page body",! Write "</body>"

Method.name: OnPageCSPROOT
Method.Implementation: s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Utiliz","Kontr")=1 s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Utiliz","Komissia")=1 s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Rash","Platej")=1 s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Rash","OplatStatus")=1 s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Rash","OplSumma")=1 s ^UnRequiredFields("Docs.Platejka","Rash")=1 Write ! Do ..OnPageHTML()

Method.name: OnPageHEAD
Method.Implementation: Write "<head>" Write !,!,"<!-- Put your page Title here -->" Write !,"<title> Cache Server Page </title>",! Write !,"</head>"

Method.name: OnPageHTML
Method.Implementation: Write "<html>" Write ! Do ..OnPageHEAD() Write !,! Do ..OnPageBODY() Write !,"</html>"
